attributes.name: Overly Sharp Crystal
attributes.description: "It's really sharp."
attributes.parsed_description: "It's really sharp."

attributes.name: Overseer's Edge
attributes.description: "There is nothing like a blade to give the overseer an edge over their workers. Especially if they always keep that edge sharp."
attributes.parsed_description: "There is nothing like a blade to give the overseer an edge over their workers. Especially if they always keep that edge sharp."

attributes.name: Overseer's Hunger
attributes.description: "Nothing can sate the Overseer's desire for more control over the world."
attributes.parsed_description: "Nothing can sate the Overseer's desire for more control over the world."

attributes.name: Overseer's Insight
attributes.description: "There is much to learn about commanding others. For one, never give them a chance to get their swords out first."
attributes.parsed_description: "There is much to learn about commanding others. For one, never give them a chance to get their swords out first."

attributes.name: Overseer's Regret
attributes.description: "The Overseer's one regret was that the musket could only kill so many with a single shot."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Overseer's one regret was that the musket could only kill so many with a single shot."

attributes.name: Overseer's Servant
attributes.description: "You are at my disposal."
attributes.parsed_description: "You are at my disposal."

attributes.name: Oversized "Wand"
attributes.description: "An overconfident mage once tried to teach an ogre to use a wand. The ogre quickly discarded the wand and killed the mage, but what remains seems to be functional as a spear."
attributes.parsed_description: "An overconfident mage once tried to teach an ogre to use a wand. The ogre quickly discarded the wand and killed the mage, but what remains seems to be functional as a spear."

attributes.name: Oversized Wood Chopper
attributes.description: "Surely this axe can chop down any tree."
attributes.parsed_description: "Surely this axe can chop down any tree."

attributes.name: Overweight Great Axe
attributes.description: "Not particularly well balanced and a bit unwieldy, but it'll get the job done."
attributes.parsed_description: "Not particularly well balanced and a bit unwieldy, but it'll get the job done."

attributes.name: Pacifist
attributes.description: "I do not wish to harm you. Step away so that no one must be hurt."
attributes.parsed_description: "I do not wish to harm you. Step away so that no one must be hurt."

attributes.name: Panacea's Touch
attributes.description: "As you grip the handle you feel your ailments begin to fade."
attributes.parsed_description: "As you grip the handle you feel your ailments begin to fade."

attributes.name: Parabellum
attributes.description: "War is a funny thing. We do not want it, yet we seek it endlessly."
attributes.parsed_description: "War is a funny thing. We do not want it, yet we seek it endlessly."

attributes.name: Pastor's Boomstick
attributes.description: "If the sound doesn't scare you, the damage it packs will."
attributes.parsed_description: "If the sound doesn't scare you, the damage it packs will."

attributes.name: Patience
attributes.description: "Deep breaths. In…out. In…out. In…draw. Out…loose."
attributes.parsed_description: "Deep breaths. In…out. In…out. In…draw. Out…loose."

attributes.name: Patient Judgement
attributes.description: "What makes the corrupted rangers truly elite is not that they know when to loose their arrow. It's that they know when to not loose it."
attributes.parsed_description: "What makes the corrupted rangers truly elite is not that they know when to loose their arrow. It's that they know when to not loose it."

attributes.name: Peace Broker
attributes.description: "Sometimes diplomacy needs to get a little violent."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sometimes diplomacy needs to get a little violent."

attributes.name: Peaceful Chill
attributes.description: "Close your eyes and give into the cold."
attributes.parsed_description: "Close your eyes and give into the cold."

attributes.name: Peaceful Dream
attributes.description: "Sleep, my sweet ones. Tomorrow you shall rise again."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sleep, my sweet ones. Tomorrow you shall rise again."

attributes.name: Permafrost Life Staff
attributes.description: "The cold does not always need to cause death. It can also preserve life and keep us safe."
attributes.parsed_description: "The cold does not always need to cause death. It can also preserve life and keep us safe."

attributes.name: Persistent Growth
attributes.description: "The smallest sapling may crush the mightest fort, with time."
attributes.parsed_description: "The smallest sapling may crush the mightest fort, with time."

attributes.name: Persuader
attributes.description: "Will you tell me? Or do you have no need of your other leg?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Will you tell me? Or do you have no need of your other leg?"

attributes.name: Pestilence
attributes.description: "Great Axe of the First Horseman."
attributes.parsed_description: "Great Axe of the First Horseman."

attributes.name: Pestillent Shortspear
attributes.description: "May this spear be a plague upon those who would do  you wrong."
attributes.parsed_description: "May this spear be a plague upon those who would do  you wrong."

attributes.name: Philippe's Poker
attributes.description: "Philippe was cruel to the prisoners he held, tormenting them every day."
attributes.parsed_description: "Philippe was cruel to the prisoners he held, tormenting them every day."

attributes.name: Phoenix Ashes
attributes.description: "I will rise again, more powerful than before."
attributes.parsed_description: "I will rise again, more powerful than before."

attributes.name: Phoenix Feather Recurve
attributes.description: "The string of the bow is said to be crafted from the feathers of a phoenix. Just as the string begins to get worn out, it appears again as fresh as the day the bow was made."
attributes.parsed_description: "The string of the bow is said to be crafted from the feathers of a phoenix. Just as the string begins to get worn out, it appears again as fresh as the day the bow was made."

attributes.name: Phoenix's Flight
attributes.description: "When thrown this javelin appears as if a flaming phoenix soaring through the sky."
attributes.parsed_description: "When thrown this javelin appears as if a flaming phoenix soaring through the sky."

attributes.name: Piercing Cold
attributes.description: "The cold bites deep."
attributes.parsed_description: "The cold bites deep."

attributes.name: Piercing Flame
attributes.description: "Let the fire fill your veins."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let the fire fill your veins."

attributes.name: Pigsticker
attributes.description: "Perfect for hunting boar and roasting them afterwards."
attributes.parsed_description: "Perfect for hunting boar and roasting them afterwards."

attributes.name: Pike of the Grand Duelist
attributes.description: "Duels are a popular past time in Aeternum. The impermenance of death allows fighters to give each duel their all without a regard for their life."
attributes.parsed_description: "Duels are a popular past time in Aeternum. The impermenance of death allows fighters to give each duel their all without a regard for their life."

attributes.name: Pike of the Wood Mistress
attributes.description: "She wanders the wilds with a spear at her side, though she dares not draw it unless challenged."
attributes.parsed_description: "She wanders the wilds with a spear at her side, though she dares not draw it unless challenged."

attributes.name: Pilgrimage's End
attributes.description: "This is merely a place to rest, before the long return journey begins."
attributes.parsed_description: "This is merely a place to rest, before the long return journey begins."

attributes.name: Pillar of Brightwood
attributes.description: "People often wonder what makes Brightwood bright. This is part of the answer."
attributes.parsed_description: "People often wonder what makes Brightwood bright. This is part of the answer."

attributes.name: Pirate's Pretty Musket
attributes.description: "So beautiful to look at and useful for plundering!"
attributes.parsed_description: "So beautiful to look at and useful for plundering!"

attributes.name: Pit Lord Dominator
attributes.description: "This sword is forged in the fires of hatred and tempered with the blood of the cruel."
attributes.parsed_description: "This sword is forged in the fires of hatred and tempered with the blood of the cruel."

attributes.name: Pixie Dust Blunderbuss
attributes.description: "Sparkles shoot forth when you pull the trigger."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sparkles shoot forth when you pull the trigger."

attributes.name: Pixie Pummeler
attributes.description: "Nasty creatures, Pixies are. Winged nuisances that need a good hammer to the back to bring them down."
attributes.parsed_description: "Nasty creatures, Pixies are. Winged nuisances that need a good hammer to the back to bring them down."

attributes.name: Pixie's Punisher
attributes.description: "Tiny, nasty creatures, Pixies wield enchanted weapons that any creature should be frightened by."
attributes.parsed_description: "Tiny, nasty creatures, Pixies wield enchanted weapons that any creature should be frightened by."
